note: PokerGuru is India’s leading news website about poker, bringing you all the updates on what’s happening in the Indian and international poker scene. Whether you play in the poker room of a casino or online from the comfort of your own home, at PokerGuru, we have something of interest to everyone. The content on the site ranges from poker rules and strategy for beginners to video reviews of online high stakes play, to live coverage of all the major poker tournaments held throughout the country.
